body.p: In culling mode, you can zoom and pan in the images to see details. Images can be zoomed until 100%.
Ctrl+scrollto zoom in/out images. left click + dragto pan in zoomed images.
By default, zooming and panning are synchronized between all visible images. If you want to zoom or pan only a specific image, add Shiftkey to above actions.
To enhance performance in zoomed images loading, you can enable the disk backend for full preview cache in preferences (see Core options). Keep in mind that this could take a lot of disk space...
